about_the_game:
If I would categorize "BattleField BattleFront," it would be summarized as a RTSTD (real-time strategy tower defense) game.

This is a 1v1 online strategy game.
Choose from eight distinct forces, select your base location, devise your strategic plan, and deploy your combat units.
Victory is achieved by eliminating all enemy bases.

Force Introductions:

Sky Crossing Mining Vessel
A mining vessel wandering within a vast fleet in closed star sectors. It lands on various planets, establishing resource centers on the surface. Continuously building various machines locally, it collects resources and transfers them back to the main vessel.
Equipped with a plethora of mechanized long-range units, it excels in both offense and defense.

Iron Jet Settlement
A settlement formed by people gathering near the Updraft Valley. They assemble jet boats from collected scrap to hunt beasts, travelers, or anything else in the Updraft Valley.
While these makeshift boats are extremely fast, they tend to fall apart quickly, so try to crash into enemy bases before they disintegrate.

Ocean Monster
A ferocious group of creatures living around the lair of sea beasts in the ocean, housing countless top predators.
Torn bodies only become prey for these monsters, making them even stronger.

Ghospire Spiders
A dangerous population of creatures residing on the Ghospire Island.
Extremely perilous, these innate hunters grow stronger with each capture of their prey.

Legacy Megacraft
After accumulating programming errors and numerous iterations, self-construction has evolved into gigantic structures of unknown purpose. The so-called "legacy megacraft" is just the small components falling from these structures. The attachment to these fallen structures has unintentionally formed a backward civilization.
Structures that cannot be completely destroyed become the foundation for the next construction after being recycled.

Gburst Spirits
Creatures generated by absorbing Earth Vein energy. Areas with Gburst Spirits seldom experience earthquakes, but as these spirits multiply, they become increasingly aggressive. It's as if the enormous energy stored in the Earth Vein manifests in a different form through the spirits.
Gburst Spirits originate from the Earth Vein and perish in explosions.

Saltseed Blossoms
Plants constantly spreading seeds to expand their territory, extracting land fertility. All seeds differentiate into various functions, and only a few gain the ability to grow into new Saltseed Blossoms after obtaining a stable and secure environment.
Immobile plants that expand their territory through continuous reproduction.

Growxin Rescue Team
A commercialized rescue team with highly armed individuals, operating in an orderly and cooperative manner. For certain fee, they can accomplish any rescue mission.
As long as you pay enough, both personnel and equipment can be airdropped across the entire map.
